body.p: This diagram depicts the classes in the FHIM Vocabulary model that are related to the FHIM Person domain. As the classes exist in another model, this diagram was created as a mechanism to provide a visualization of those classes. Each codified property in the FHIM will eventually have a corresponding entry in CDC’s PHIN VADS terminology server. Each value set entry in PHIN VADS is represented by a UML class in the FHIM Vocabulary model, with the members of the value set represented as a UML enumeration. This approach is consistent with the Model Driven Health Tools (MDHT) architecture, which enables the use of MDHT to perform model-to-model transformations.
